tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
  sensor_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  activity_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_sensor_data (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    reading_type VARCHAR(50),
    reading_value FLOAT,
    reading_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE human_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(50),
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    activity_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    impact_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE activity_log (
   log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   activity_type VARCHAR(50),
   activity_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
   user_id INT,
   location VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE SensorData (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_name VARCHAR(255),
  sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
  value DECIMAL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Location (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  latitude DECIMAL,
  longitude DECIMAL,
  city VARCHAR(50),
  country VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Activity (
  activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  activity_name VARCHAR(255),
  activity_type VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Impact (
  impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  impact_type VARCHAR(50),
  severity DECIMAL,
  location_id INT,
  activity_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE SensorData (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
  measurement_value FLOAT,
  measurement_unit VARCHAR(10),
  measurement_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE LocationData (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT,
  area_name VARCHAR(50),
  city VARCHAR(50),
  country VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE ActivityData (
  activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  activity_type VARCHAR(50),
  activity_description TEXT,
  activity_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE ImpactData (
  impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  impact_type VARCHAR(50),
  impact_description TEXT,
  impact_category VARCHAR(50),
  impact_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE EnvironmentalData (
  environment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  environmental_factor VARCHAR(50),
  environment_value FLOAT,
  environment_unit VARCHAR(10),
  environment_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
